title: leave buster
body: when your waiting for your leave buster time to count down, is you not being able to use client meant to be apart of the punishment?

replies.body: it sucks when your stuck in 1 thing and you can't do anything till the 10/20/30 minutes and not only do you suffer but your friends as well(if there in your group)

That's called a deterrent. If someone can't do anything in the client for 5/10/20 minutes, in sets of 5, because they kept DCing from games it gives them a reason to choose not to leave or to sort out their connection/computer issues. Having it apply to everyone who queues with them makes some people not want to queue said punished players while they've got LPQ which, in turn, results in the punished player having a worse experience. The entire LPQ experience is designed to be unpleasant so as to persuade people to sort out their sh!t.
yeah but you shouldn't have to wait 20minutes and share at a countdown timer until the cows come home.
yes so if somebody messages you and u make them wait 20 mins to respond you feel guilty inside
